name: Sheet Pan Quinoa & Spinach Salad

ingredients.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or your favourite dip mix, optional

preparation: For dressing, using the Funnel, measure oil, vinegar, and dressing mix into a Cruet. Screw on lid; shake to mix. If making ahead, cover and refrigerate up to 1 week.
For salad, place quinoa in Multipurpose Steamer. Stir in 1 cup hot water, and broth or dip mix. Cover; microwave on high until tender and water has absorbed, 12–15 min.
Meanwhile, peel and segment clementines. Thinly slice apple.

To serve, spoon quinoa onto bottom third of Sheet Pan. Fill top part of pan with spinach, then arrange clementines and apple overtop. Sprinkle with nuts. Drizzle with 1⁄2 cup dressing; taste and add more if needed.
tips: Cut apple in half and scoop out seeds. Using the 4-in-1 Mandoline, thinly slice apple.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
